item.title: kaiseki style has been adopted the world over, the best ingredients at their peak, served in a series of small dishes of tastes and textures irrevocably linked to each other making an edible narrative of time and place.
item.description: kaiseki style has been adopted the world over, the best ingredients at their peak, served in a series of small dishes of tastes and textures irrevocably linked to each other making an edible narrative of time and place.

item.title: how it was and how it is
item.description:
how it was and how it is

When I started cooking in the 70s the ultimate menus were made up of continental cuisine.
